survey_name: Electric Vehicle Adoption and Perception Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer perceptions, barriers, and motivations related to electric vehicle (EV) adoption to inform marketing and product development strategies.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) in the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure options are balanced and avoid leading language.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) in the next 5 years?

questions.question_text: What are the top 3 factors that would influence your decision to purchase an EV?
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select with a limit of 3 choices. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with max selections = 3. Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the top 3 factors that would influence your decision to purchase an EV?

questions.question_text: What is your biggest concern about owning an electric vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with an 'Other' option for additional concerns.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your biggest concern about owning an electric vehicle?

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the current government incentives for EV purchases in your region?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale to avoid neutral midpoint bias.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the current government incentives for EV purchases in your region?

questions.question_text: How often do you currently use public charging stations for EVs (if applicable)?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who own or frequently use EVs
questions.client_notes: Only show this question to EV owners or frequent users. Use clear frequency options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Add skip logic for non-EV users.

script.question_text: How often do you currently use public charging stations for EVs (if applicable)?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who own or frequently use EVs

questions.question_text: What type of vehicle do you currently own?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to segment respondents by current vehicle type.

script.question_text: What type of vehicle do you currently own?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of fast-charging stations in your decision to purchase an EV?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point importance scale to gauge priority.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of fast-charging stations in your decision to purchase an EV?

questions.question_text: Which of the following EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to assess brand awareness. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your household income range?
questions.client_notes: Use income brackets for privacy and ease of response. Include a 'Prefer not to say' option.

script.question_text: What is your household income range?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or concerns you have about electric vehicles.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Keep it optional.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or concerns you have about electric vehicles.
